Class Game

java.lang.Object
  Game

public class Game
extends java.lang.Object

This class is the main class of the "RESTHOUSE BREAK" application. This main class creates the necessary implementation objects and starts the game off.

Version:
1.0 (mai 2009)
Author:
Charlet Pierre, Kniebihler Nicolas, Provost Kevin
